about.title: DIY Security Lab Manifesto
about.subtitle: Bitcoin, Freedom, and Sovereignty
about.description: DIY Security Lab is a company focused on solutions that promote Bitcoin adoption by removing intermediaries and empowering end users. We created BITKIT, the safest and simplest method to store Bitcoins, and Alfred P2P, a platform for decentralized and anonymous purchasing. Our mission is to ensure that everyone can control their own assets securely and independently, contributing to a freer and more decentralized financial future.
about.founders: DIY Security Lab was founded in 2024 by three engineers passionate about decentralized finance who began studying the crypto market in 2017. Leonardo Maximiliano, CEO, is fascinated by macroeconomics and the social impacts Bitcoin can generate in different social structures. Guilherme, with his focus on business management and entrepreneurship, constantly seeks disruptive innovations. Giovanni, the 'tech nerd,' turns ideas into advanced technical solutions. Together, they complement each other to create solutions that promote Bitcoin adoption, empowering end users and eliminating intermediaries.
about.manifestTitle: DIY Security Lab Manifesto: Bitcoin, Freedom and Sovereignty
about.manifest: At DIY Sec Lab, we deeply believe in Bitcoin as a tool for individual emancipation. It is not just a digital currency, but a symbol of freedom and sovereignty, allowing each person to take control of their own destiny, without depending on intermediaries or centralized institutions. We know that true freedom is only possible with security. This is why we advocate offline storage of cryptocurrencies, where the user is the sole custodian of their assets. Our commitment is to facilitate this process, making it accessible to everyone to protect their funds independently and safely, away from digital threats. Bitcoin paves the way for a future where power returns to the hands of the people. At DIY Sec Lab, our mission is to support this journey by offering the tools and knowledge necessary for each individual to live this sovereignty with confidence, simplicity and responsibility. We believe Bitcoin is the key to true autonomy, and we are here to help open that door.

tutorials.title: Tutorials
tutorials.description: DOWNLOAD FREE FILES WEâ€™VE PREPARED JUST FOR YOU, WHETHER YOU'RE STARTING OUT OR WANT TO LEARN MORE

1.title: CREATE YOUR PRIVATE KEY AND SAVE YOUR BITCOINS
1.description: Learn how to create your key and deposit Bitcoin securely. This tutorial is essential for starting your cryptocurrency journey.

2.title: ADD A PASSWORD (PASSPHRASE)
2.description: Add a strong password to your wallet and keep your Bitcoins secure. An essential tutorial to protect your digital assets.

3.title: HOW TO ACCESS YOUR WALLET AND TRANSFER BITCOINS
3.description: Learn how to recover your wallet and send Bitcoin easily, while keeping full control of your funds.

4.title: HOW TO RECOVER YOUR ACCOUNT WITHOUT THE KRUX DEVICE (COLD WALLET)
4.description: Learn how to drill metal plates safely and efficiently, an important guide for anyone working with manual materials.

5.title: HOW TO IMPORT YOUR WALLET INTO BLUEWALLET
5.description: Import your wallet into BlueWallet easily and access your Bitcoins securely and conveniently.

6.title: HOW TO ASSEMBLE YOUR AUTOMATIC PUNCH
6.description: Assemble an automatic punch to optimize your work and increase the precision of your processes.

7.title: VALIDATE THE CODE INSTALLED IN YOUR WALLET
7.description: Learn how to verify the Krux code to ensure the security of your digital transactions.

8.title: HOW TO BACKUP YOUR PRIVATE KEY (SEEDQR)
8.description: Create your SeedQR securely to protect your data and cryptocurrencies.

9.title: HOW TO BACKUP YOUR PRIVATE KEY (TINY SEED)
9.description: Safely back up your data on Tiny Seed and never lose your important information.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
text: Your privacy is essential to us. It is the policy of DIY Security Lab to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect on the site https://www.diyseclab.io and other sites we operate.

We collect personal information only when we truly need it to provide a service. We do so fairly and legally, with your knowledge and consent. We also inform you of the purpose for which we are collecting this information and how it will be used.

We retain the collected information only for as long as necessary to provide the requested service. When we store data, we use commercially acceptable means to prevent loss, theft, unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use, or modification.
We do not publicly disclose personally identifiable information or share it with third parties, except as required by law.

Our site may contain links to external sites that are not operated by us. Be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites and cannot assume responsibility for their respective privacy policies.
You are free to decline our request for personal information, understanding that we may not be able to provide some of the desired services if you do.

Continued use of our site will be considered acceptance of our privacy practices and handling of personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, please contact us.
